comments:
i0326:1300

I have a CVS connection. I set it up so it uses a pserver connection for
reading. But in my haste I had picked the wrong pserver connection. When I try
to expand the tree to see the contents of HEAD, nothing happens.

Could we do something that might let the user know that something was wrong? I
tried a couple of things and then after a while I noticed that I had picked the
wrong connection in the "use for read access" part.

Silently logged in the log file is the following:
